31367.name: Figma To Stitches
31367.description:
Unofficial Stitches Plugin that converts Figma styles to Stitches config


Forked from Figma to Tailwind plugin https://github.com/jan-dh/figma-tailwindcss

30823.name: Crylic
30823.description:
Integrate Crylic with Figma!


This plugin supports importing elements exported through Crylic.

Learn more at https://docs.crylic.io/workflows/exporting-to-figma

32841.name: Figma Nocode - Export Design to Website absolutely free
32841.description:
è‡´åŠ›äº�æˆ�ä¸ºæœ€ç®€å�•çš„å°†è®¾è®¡è½¬æ�¢ä¸ºç½‘ç«™çš„å·¥å…·ã€‚æ— éœ€ç™»å½•ï¼Œå®Œå…¨å…�è´¹ã€‚


Aims to be the simplest tool which convert design into website. No login required, absolutely free.


## ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•

## To get started


1. install the plugin

2. convert the design

3. preview/manage/download the website


## åˆ�è¡·


ä½œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå‰�ç«¯å¼€å�‘è€…ï¼Œæœ€ä¸»è¦�çš„å·¥ä½œå†…å®¹å°±æ˜¯å°†è®¾è®¡å¸ˆçš„è®¾è®¡ç¨¿è¿˜å�Ÿæˆ�ç½‘ç«™é¡µé�¢ï¼Œé�¢å¯¹è¿™éƒ¨åˆ†é‡�å¤�å�•è°ƒçš„å·¥ä½œï¼Œæˆ‘å¸Œæœ›åˆ©ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå·¥å…·å�¯ä»¥å®Œæˆ�å®ƒä»¬ï¼Œæˆ–è‡³å°‘å�¯ä»¥å‡�å°‘æˆ‘çš„å·¥ä½œé‡�ã€‚


æˆ‘çš„åˆ�è¡·å°±æ˜¯å�šä¸€ä¸ªèƒ½å¤Ÿç›´æ�¥å°†è®¾è®¡ç¨¿è½¬æ�¢ä¸ºç½‘ç«™çš„å·¥å…·ã€‚


æˆ‘å´‡å°šç®€çº¦çš„ç”Ÿæ´»æ–¹å¼�ï¼Œå¯¹äº�äº§å“�ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ã€‚æˆ‘ä¸�å¸Œæœ›å› ä¸ºç›ˆåˆ©ç­‰é—®é¢˜å°†äº§å“�å¤�æ�‚åŒ–ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥æ�’ä»¶ä¹Ÿå�ªä¿�ç•™æœ€ç®€å�•çš„ 2 æ­¥ï¼šè½¬æ�¢ï¼Œä¸‹è½½ã€‚


## How do i come up with this idea?


As a Front-end developer, my main work is to convert designs into websites. Against the repetitive work, I hope to use a tool to solve them, or at least reduce my work.


So at first, I just want to make a tool which can convert designs into websites directly.


I love minimalist living style, same on my products. I don't want to make the product complex because of the profits. So in my plugin, there are only 2 steps in the main process: convert, download.


## å��æœŸè®¾æƒ³


å…¶å®�ç›®å‰�çš„æ ¹æœ¬éœ€æ±‚å�ªå®�ç�°äº†ä¸€å�Šã€‚


è¦�å�šåˆ°è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å�˜æˆ�ç½‘ç«™ï¼Œä»…ä»…æ˜¯å°†è®¾è®¡è½¬æ�¢ä¸ºç½‘é¡µä»£ç �æ˜¯ä¸�å¤Ÿçš„ï¼Œè‡³å°‘è¿˜éœ€è¦�å°†ç½‘é¡µéƒ¨ç½²åˆ°æœ�åŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å…¨ç�ƒçš„äººéƒ½èƒ½æµ�è§ˆä½ çš„ç½‘ç«™äº†ã€‚


æ‰€ä»¥å��é�¢ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¼šåœ¨å…¼é¡¾é¡µé�¢è½¬æ�¢è´¨é‡�çš„å�Œæ—¶ï¼Œç�€æ‰‹å®�ç�°ç½‘ç«™éƒ¨ç½²çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå¸Œæœ›æ­¤åŠŸèƒ½èƒ½æ—©æ—¥å’Œå¤§å®¶è§�é�¢ã€‚å±Šæ—¶å¤§å®¶å°±å�¯ä»¥å°†è®¾è®¡ç¨¿å�˜æˆ�çœŸæ­£æ„�ä¹‰ä¸Šçš„ç½‘ç«™äº†ã€‚


## The future plan


Actually, the original feature is only half done.


Cus `convert design into website` means not only transform designs into webpages, but also deploy the webpages to the server, so that everyone can browse your website.


So in the future, i will focus on the feature of deploying webpages. Hoping deploying feature would see you soon.

32776.name: Dark Matter
32776.description:
Quickly switch between light and dark canvas. 


Usage:

  1. Install â€˜Dark Matterâ€™ Plugin.
  2. Run the plugin once.
  3. When no frame is selected, the plugin will appear in the Properties Panel (Design).
  4. Switch between light (#E5E5E5) and dark (#1E1E1E) canvas by clicking the button. 


The best part - thereâ€™s no need to rerun the plugin. Once run, itâ€™s available on all your pages for that particular file.


If you use this and find it helpful, Iâ€™d love to hear from you. Iâ€™m @KhatriDakshi on Twitter. Or support me here.


Lastly, if you come across a bug or if you have any ideas, share that too.


Enjoy!â�¤ï¸�

32450.name: BlipAnalytics
32450.description: Plugin para analizes de dados da takeblip

32809.name: Explode Frames
32809.description:
Detach all component instances and disable all auto layouts in a given selection.


Revert file to a setup closer to traditional design softwares for quick iterations, isolated studies and collaboration with non-designers.


Use with caution.

32680.name: Whitelabel Colour Generator
32680.description:
A plugin built specifically for the OnCall team! This plugin will take an accounts primary brand colour and generate supporting colours. 


The colours that will be generated are:

  • Dark Primary
  • Light Primary
  • Off-White Primary
  • UI Primary

33111.name: Nifty Paste
33111.description:
Insert beautiful NFTs to your designs easily.


-----

To be able to use the plugin you need to register. Please contact for getting account

33080.name: Fiona Copy Pasta
33080.description: Copy and paste Figma layouts and convert them to production ready jsx code

32490.name: SSelect
32490.description:
Make quick selections in quick actions. âœ¨


Extending the built in "Select all with ..." commands and without the need to open ui, all happens in the quick actions. Just âŒ˜ + / and sselect!


ğŸ�¯ Selection:


Select nodes with same types, names, or main components becomes few keys away.


Instance

  • Select all instances within parent frame
  • Select all instances within root frame
  • Select all instances

Type

  • Select all with same type within parent frame
  • Select all with same type within root frame
  • Select all with same type

Name

  • Select all with same name within parent frame
  • Select all with same name within root frame
  • Select all with same name


ğŸ”� Search and Select:


Search within selection or in page for deeply nested nodes, using filter to make the search more easily to select!


Filter type

  • All
  • Frame

  • Media
  • Text
  • Vector
  • Rectangle

Search by name

33120.name: AutoHTML
33120.description:
This Plugin converts Figma frames to HTML & CSS. Works best with Auto layout and/or constraints. Color styles and text styles are also partly transferred as variables.


It's meant to be used by developers as a starting point for components.

32920.name: Figma to Flashtalking
32920.description: Quickly convert your Figma project to animated and dynamic Flashtalking ads.

32742.name: Refine
32742.description: Simple plugin for Karat design team, to quickly set up Figma files.

32830.name: Rotate replicas
32830.description:
Check out the demo: https://twitter.com/imohanvadivel/status/1528290607160250370


  • Select a node and run the plugin
  • Enter the total number of nodes to be created (inclusive of the initial node)
  • All replicas, along with the handle, appear on the canvas
  • Drag the red handle to rotate other nodes accordingly


Tip

Since the handle is a line node, you can use Figma's default alignment option to quickly position the origin.


File bugs: https://github.com/imohanvadivel/rotate-replicas/issues

32918.name: Figma2Flutter
32918.description:
Figma2Flutter is a free tool that converts your designs into real Flutter apps.

 

Do you want a better looking prototype? Would you like to run your prototype on a real target device? Are you tired of waiting for developers to implement your design? Would you prefer to hand off the design together with auto generated UI components for the target platform in Flutter? If your answer is yes to any of these, then you will want to check out Figma2Flutter.

 

With Figma2Flutter, you can turn your design into a working application in minutes. Use the Figma2Flutter plugin to annotate your UI components with their states, screens, pop ups, menus... and just click Export to get a working Flutter project you can compile and run.

 

Figma2Flutter uses Figma's prototype features, such as interactions, to generate your application. Think of it like a preview that you can turn into a real application.

 

Flutter is designed to work on multiple platforms by using the same code base, so whatever you're designing, Flutter has you covered, whether it is a website, an iOS/Android app or even Desktop Windows, Linux and MacOS app.


For more information head over to the official Figma2Flutter website.
